pages.text: This cluster can be made by first melting the uncommon cluster in a thermopneumatic processing plant, then casting it into an ingot cast, pressurizing it with plastic, pressing it into a slab with a metal press, and finally casting liquid cobblestone over it in a casting basin. Then you can coal meal it with Double Enriched Coal Meal.

$(br)  You can process it by combining it with an earth charge to make silver dust, or by heating it with a blaze burner, getting the stone off in the centrifuge, and then quenching it in water, salt water, or plant oil, depending on what you want out.
